Category: Drama|Drama
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_QL75_UY281_CR18,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: Tel père, tel fils
programme.desc: Ryota Nonomiya, architecte rigide et exigeant, et son épouse élèvent leur fils Keita, 6 ans. Un jour, les Nonomiya apprennent que suite à un malencontreux échange de bébés à la maternité, Keita n'est pas leur enfant. Leur garçon a en fait été élevé par les Saiki. Le personnel de l'hôpital conseill aux parents de procéder rapidement à l'échange. Les quatre parents préfèrent d'abord passer du temps entre eux. Mais ils sont très différents.

programme.title: Betty
programme.sub-title: S1 E6 Les filles sont dans la place

programme.title: Les saveurs du succès
programme.desc: Carsten et Maggi, parents de deux adorables enfants, mène une vie de rêve. Le couple, passionné, dirige avec brio le Malus, un restaurant très sophistiqué de Copenhague. Tandis que Maggi compose savamment l'atmosphère de l'établissement, Carsten, chef perfectionniste jusqu'à l'obsession, n'attend fébrilement qu'une chose : la visite d'un inspecteur qui leur permettra enfin de remporter la première étoile du Guide Michelin. Alors que la pression est considérable, une lettre anonyme; destinée à Carsten, est déposée au restaurant. Celle-ci affirme que Maggi est amoureuse d'un autre homme.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Thriller.

programme.title: Balnéothérapie
programme.desc: Jonas et Cléo sont partis observer les baleines. Pourtant, lorsque le jeune couple arrive a¶ destination, la station balnéaire est complétement déserte et particulièrement inquiétante. Face a¶ cet environnement hostile, Cléo espère que Jonas saura la protéger du danger.

programme.title: La vallée blanche
programme.desc: En plein cœur de l'hiver, Lucie découvre un village où tout le monde s'est endormi. Fascinée par Noémie, une jeune femme assoupie, Lucie s'installe chez elle.

programme.title: Les Croods
programme.desc: Les Crood, famille de Néandertal, vit selon des règles bien précises, dictées par le père, Grug, depuis des années. Pour éviter l'extinction, Grug interdit toute prise de risque à sa femme et à ses enfants. Mais Eep, adolescente, ne supporte plus ce mode de vie corseté. Tout change quand elle rencontre Guy, un jeune homme qui sait maîtriser le feu. Le lendemain, la destruction de leur caverne pousse les Crood a découvrir un monde qui leur était inconnu.

programme.title: Les Trolls
programme.desc: Pendant longtemps, les trolls, de petites créatures colorées, vivaient heureux dans les arbres de la forêt où ils passaient leur temps à chanter, danser et à se faire des câlins. Jusqu'au jour où ils ont été découverts par les bergen, des monstres sinistres et géants, qui ont découvert qu'ils pouvaient être heureux en mangeant des trolls. Vingt ans ont passé et les trolls vivent cachés dans la forêt, sous la houlette du roi Peppy et de sa fille, la joyeuse princesse Poppy. Parmi eux, Branche, beaucoup moins joyeux, car il vit dans la crainte permanente que les bergen ne trouvent leur cachette.

programme.title: La jeune fille et son aigle
programme.desc: En Mongolie, Aisholpan, une jeune fille kazakh âgée de treize ans, tente de s'imposer en tant que dresseuse d'aigles royaux, un métier réservé aux hommes. Avec l'aide de son père, elle décide d'adopter un aigle pour en faire un chasseur de renards.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Après la vive réaction de Jimmy contre le père d'Antigone, Elizabeth décide de le faire transférer en HP.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: La tentative de suicide de Jimmy a des effets dans tout le service. Les infirmiers décident de se mettre en grève.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Les grands-parents de Jimmy débarquent dans le service de l'HP sans savoir qu'il s'y trouve. Sheila entretient une relation ambigüe avec Baya.

programme.title: The Song of Names
programme.desc: Juste avant que la Seconde Guerre mondiale éclate, Dovidl Rapoport, un jeune virtuose polonais d'origine juive, est confié à une famille bourgeoise londonienne. D'abord jaloux, Martin, le fils unique des Simmonds, finit par se lier d'amitié avec lui. En 1951, juste avant un concert important, Dovidl, alors âgé de 21 ans, disparaît sans laisser de traces. Des décennies plus tard, Martin, devenu critique musical, est toujours à sa recherche. Un jour, il pense tenir une piste quand il voit un jeune violoniste tenir son archet de la même manière que Dovidl.

programme.title: Une femme douce
programme.desc: Dans un village reculé Russie, une femme, déboutée par l'administration pénitentiaire, se voit retourner un colis qu'elle avait destiné quelques temps plus tôt à son mari incarcéré, à l’autre bout du pays, pour un crime qu'il n'a pas commis. Inquiète et désemparée, elle décide d’aller le porter elle-même à son époux. Mais, entre la mauvaise foi des fonctionnaires et la corruption des policiers, son parcours est semé d’embûches et d’humiliations. Arrivé au pénitencier, elle demande alors à voir son mari, mais personne ne peut lui dire où il se trouve.

programme.title: Boule et Bill
programme.desc: En France, en 1976, Boule, 9 ans, et ses parents s'arrêtent au chenil lors d'une promenade dominicale et ils découvrent un cocker. Malgré l'opposition du père, le chiot, baptisé Bill, est rapidement adopté. Mais, bien qu'animé de bonnes intentions, il multiplie les catastrophes. Quand la famille doit déménager pour Paris, le père tente, sans succès, d'en profiter pour se débarrasser de lui. C'est le moment où la tortue Caroline intègre la famille. Elle tombe amoureuse de Bill.

programme.title: Nicostratos le pélican
programme.desc: Comédie.

programme.title: 120 battements par minute
programme.desc: Au début des années 1990, Nathan participe pour la première fois à une assemblée de l'association Act Up Paris, qui milite pour les droits des séropositifs. Dès le premier soir, il se porte volontaire avec d'autres adhérents pour mener une action spectaculaire contre un laboratoire pharmaceutique. Nathan assiste ensuite à de nombreuses réunions où les échanges sont souvent musclés. Là, il rencontre Sean, à l'engagement et au discours particulièrement virulents. Après avoir distribué des tracts dans un lycée, ils tombent amoureux. Mais Sean est atteint du sida.

programme.title: Un peu, beaucoup, aveuglément
programme.desc: Une jeune pianiste, passionnée par son art mais peu sûre d'elle, s'installe enfin seule dans un appartement. Mais, dès la première nuit, d'étranges bruits l'effraient et la poussent à revenir chez Evguénie, son protecteur et professeur de piano. Le lendemain, elle persiste et découvre que son voisin le plus proche, un inventeur solitaire, voulait lui faire quitter son appartement. Entre les deux démarre une guerre sonore. Pourtant, bientôt, ils apprennent à se connaître.

programme.title: Dans Paris
programme.desc: Paul, 30 ans, rompt avec Anna et retourne quelques jours chez son père pour passer ce cap difficile. Son frère Jonathan, jeune homme insouciant, encore étudiant, tente de le sortir de sa déprime. Au cours d'une seule journée ponctuée de diverses rencontres, la famille, y compris la mère qui avait quitté son mari depuis plusieurs années, va se ressouder pour aider Paul à oublier ses pensées suicidaires.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Après la vive réaction de Jimmy contre le père d'Antigone, Elizabeth décide de le faire transférer en HP.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: La tentative de suicide de Jimmy a des effets dans tout le service. Les infirmiers décident de se mettre en grève.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Les grands-parents de Jimmy débarquent dans le service de l'HP sans savoir qu'il s'y trouve. Sheila entretient une relation ambigüe avec Baya.

programme.title: Le premier jour du reste de ta vie
programme.desc: Alors que Marie-Jeanne Duval est une maman douce, Robert, lui, est un père plutôt effacé, qui gagne sa vie comme chauffeur de taxi. Ensemble, ils ont deux fils et une fille : Albert, brillant mais colérique, Raphaël, un doux rêveur mélomane, et enfin Fleur, la benjamine révoltée. Sur une période d'une douzaine d'années, chacun des membres de cette famille, semblable à beaucoup d'autres, va vivre une journée qui marquera à jamais son existence. Ainsi, pour suivre des études de médecine, Albert s'installe dans un studio et fait la connaissance de sa voisine.

programme.title: Enragé
programme.desc: Par une nuit pluvieuse, un homme s'introduit dans un pavillon de banlieue, en tue les occupants avant de mettre le feu à la maison.. Plus tard, Rachel, sur le point de divorcer et en retard au travail, conduit un peu vite pour emmener son fils à l'école avant se rendre au bureau. C'est alors qu'elle klaxonne de façon intempestive avant de doubler la voiture située devant elle. Seulement, le conducteur de cette voiture est l'assassin, un homme passablement perturbé, qui n'apprécie pas cette incivilité.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: Les michetonneuses
programme.desc: Venues d'horizons différents, Anissa, Eden et Maya sont d'inséparables copines. Si Eden et Maya sont superbes, Anissa souffre d’obésité naissante. La première cesse de «michetonner», la deuxième continue, Anissa aurait bien voulu mais ses rondeurs la freinent. Elles tiennent à leur liberté et rêvent d’amour. Ces banlieusardes investissent Paris en dépensant ce qu’elles gagnent en produits de luxe. La vie va chambouler cette situation quand Anissa est arrêtée pour avoir volé un sac de marque….

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: Comédie romantique.

programme.title: The Big Short : le casse du siècle
programme.desc: Dans les années 1970, le métier de banquier n'était pas particulièrement à la mode, jusqu'à l'intervention de Lewis Ranieri, qui a mis à la mode les obligations hypothécaires. Un frénésie s'est emparée de la finance pendant une trentaine d'années, jusqu'à un arrêt brutal avec la crise mondiale de 2008. Jared Vennett explique comment un analyste financier et des investisseurs de Wall Street ont senti le vent tourner et parié sur l'échec d'un système voué à s'effondrer.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: L'élève Ducobu
programme.desc: Comédie.

programme.title: L'ivresse du pouvoir
programme.desc: Jeanne Charmant-Killman, juge à Paris, instruit une délicate affaire touchant aux milieux politiques et industriels. D'emblée, elle fait incarcérer pour détournement de fonds Michel Humeau, le président d'un puissant groupe industriel public qu’elle commence à interroger avec acharnement. Comme les autres personnes impliquées, Humeau reste muet. Jeanne se voit adjoindre une seconde magistrate avec qui elle travaille en bonne intelligence. Bientôt, les pressions pour la stopper vont s'intensifiant. Jeanne, incorruptible, se sent de plus en plus menacée.

programme.title: Autonomes
programme.desc: Pendant la période de Pâques en 2019, François Bégaudeau s'est rendu dans le département de la Mayenne pour rencontrer des personnes qui vivent au plus près de la nature. Pour le premier interviewé, qui vit dans les bois, l'accès à une eau propre est une question très importante. Cette question de l'eau est partagée dans la région, comme en témoignent deux sourciers. C'est aussi une des préoccupations d'une famille qui s'est installée dans un territoire autrefois appelé «les fontaines». Le couple, parvenu à s'installer grâce à un héritage, revient ensuite sur la question de l'autonomie et sur le rapport à la nature.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.sub-title: S1 E5 Les mangeurs de lotus

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara Beasley, influenceuse de renom sur Internet, est sur le point de revenir son site à très bon prix à une firme. Ses manières égoïstes rendent la vie impossible à Evie, la nourrice de ses trois enfants.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara a fait des révélations à Nick qui pourraient bien empêcher la signature sur contrat juteux qu'elle doit signer avec la firme américaine. Le monde de Roxanne s'écroule quand Jordan est arrêté pour fraude.

Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"uncatw6"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very very very good show...top 3 series finale ever","reviewBody":"The shield is one of the best cop shows of all time, only behind "The Wire." The story line is rich and the cast is just brilliant. Michael Chiklis had a career defining role as the brutal Vic Mackey. Chiklis is so good that somehow you continue to root for the guy after all of the brutal crimes he has committed. He truly played that role to perfection. The show continues to get better as the seasons progress. They build on each other perfectly which sets up the epic and heart-wrenching series finale. 

As the seasons build, life truly seems to be on the line for every member of the strike team. Walton Goggins, who plays Detective Shane Vendrell, continually got better as the show progressed and gave mind blowing performance in the last two seasons.

What also makes The Shield so rich are the other characters on the show other than the Strike Team. CCH Pounder was brilliant throughout the series and Detective Dutch Waggenbach and Steve Billings both helped balance out the show.

Season long guest stints from stars Forrest Whitaker and Glenn Close helped make this show a top 10 drama of the decade.

If you like "The Wire" or "The Sopranos" then you need to check this show out...It will be worth your time","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76742,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-03-12","keywords":"corrupt cop,los angeles california,made for cable tv,mayor,drugs","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004821/","name":"Michael Chiklis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0413052/","name":"Michael Jace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439813/","name":"Jay Karnes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086397/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0203234/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752841/","name":"Shawn Ryan"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Shield: Season Seven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi425591577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NjYxNjgtYmIzYy00ZmUzLTllNjMtMzA3MDMwMDAxZmQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home video trailer for the final season of this cop show"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Shield
The Shield
programme.sub-title: S7 E8 Au nom du père
programme.desc:
The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"uncatw6"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very very very good show...top 3 series finale ever","reviewBody":"The shield is one of the best cop shows of all time, only behind "The Wire." The story line is rich and the cast is just brilliant. Michael Chiklis had a career defining role as the brutal Vic Mackey. Chiklis is so good that somehow you continue to root for the guy after all of the brutal crimes he has committed. He truly played that role to perfection. The show continues to get better as the seasons progress. They build on each other perfectly which sets up the epic and heart-wrenching series finale. 

As the seasons build, life truly seems to be on the line for every member of the strike team. Walton Goggins, who plays Detective Shane Vendrell, continually got better as the show progressed and gave mind blowing performance in the last two seasons.

What also makes The Shield so rich are the other characters on the show other than the Strike Team. CCH Pounder was brilliant throughout the series and Detective Dutch Waggenbach and Steve Billings both helped balance out the show.

Season long guest stints from stars Forrest Whitaker and Glenn Close helped make this show a top 10 drama of the decade.

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 5923012, Title: Here and Now, --- Description: Here and Now: Created by Alan Ball. With Tim Robbins, Holly Hunter, Daniel Zovatto, Jerrika Hinton. A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5923012/","name":"Here and Now","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDIwOTg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAxMzc1NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 Americ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5923012/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"WorldProxy","dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing, Interesting, Well Written","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under (Alan Ball) brought me here. I was really disappointed it got cancelled. The characters were interesting, the stories were interesting, I enjoyed the social diversity and awareness of issues and how different groups reacted to everything. I liked the supernatural element and I'm a huge fan of Peter Macdissi. What I don't like is tricked out right-wingers who write reviews and are too stupid to understand that it's a TV show on HBO where you can have Gay, Muslim, Asian, Black, White, Latin, and homeless characters involved in relationships and have love for each other, but fail to mention the hate and racism of Nazi wannabe society, which by the way is a real problem in real life as well as in the show. If you're too sensitive and fragile for this sort of thing, then stick to whatever safe and insipid programs that appeal to your comfortable taste. Either that or shave your beard, lose the smelly red hat and grow a brain. I also think the show is self-aware, conscience, multi-layered, smart and definitely keeps you involved.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4733,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-02-11","keywords":"transvestite,racism,chlamydia,homophobia,progressivism","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4683167/","name":"Daniel Zovatto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Premieres Tonight, 9/8c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1020377113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A multi-racial family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Somalia, Vietnam and Colombia and one biological child, find their bonds tested when one of the children begins seeing things which the rest cannot."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis","dateCreated":"2009-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Show Does The Impossible","reviewBody":"When using superlatives with this show it is totally fair. This show does something all other movies, shows, etc cannot do: it can safely apply any genre and still function as a deep and very entertaining show. As everybody episode goes by the show only becomes more addictive. It taps into almost every aspect of life. Every emotion is shown; love, hate, forgiveness, triumph and the list goes on and on. In fact this show depicts life the most realistically. The strangeness and peculiarity of the many themes perfectly displays the confusion in life and how it affects us. The show displays confusion in the clearest way making it almost impossible not to some how relate to the characters in the show. Not to mention also the series ends on one finest note you will ever see not just satisfying the viewer but taking the show to a level far and above anything else I have ever seen before. This show does the impossible twice over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 2433738, Title: Wentworth, --- Description: Wentworth: Created by Reg Watson, Lara Radulovich. With Kate Atkinson, Katrina Milosevic, Robbie Magasiva, Jacqueline Brennan. Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2433738/","name":"Wentworth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDkxZmFhMDAtMmIyZS00NjAwLThlYjctZDQwMWQwYzdlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2433738/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mastas1","dateCreated":"2013-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great re-make of a classic Aussie drama","reviewBody":"Initial skepticism of trying to remake a classic serial drama like Prisoner was quickly dispelled in the first few minutes of episode 1. This is a completely new take on a long running series from the 1980s with the necessary level of added grit needed in 2013. Whilst employing many of the well known character names; the "new" version has created juicy variations to the originals. Those familiar with the original series should not allow themselves to by put off in the early stages by casting of different types to play the original characters. Ep 1 was edgy, well paced and the acting overall was very good. If Wentworth can maintain the same intensity over its remaining 9 episodes of season 1, it will be a treat to watch. As well as seeing how the initial variation to different main characters develop, perhaps growing into their more familiar traits from the original series as the new series progresses. Clearly this re-make is attempting to tell the background story as to how the likes of Bea Smith, Vera Bennett, Meg Jackson and Frankie Doyle came to be like they were in the original Prisoner series.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-05-01","keywords":"jail,women in prison,prison,female prisoner,female convict","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040753/","name":"Kate Atkinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1319592/","name":"Katrina Milosevic","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0535741/","name":"Robbie Magasiva"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0357122/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914844/","name":"Reg Watson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1416718/","name":"Lara Radulovich"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer Wentworth Prison","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872397593","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

Warning: This Drug May Kill You
programme.desc: Warning: This Drug May Kill You: Directed by Perri Peltz. An unflinching look at the devastating effects of addiction through the stories of four families whose lives have been decimated by addictions that all began with legitimate prescriptions to dangerous painkillers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6710212/","name":"Warning: This Drug May Kill You","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTVlOWZkYjctZDE5Ny00MzdmLTg2YTYtMGQ2NmJkMzE5NTNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An unflinching look at the devastating effects of addiction through the stories of four families whose lives have been decimated by addictions that all began with legitimate prescriptions to dangerous painkillers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6710212/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sandygolinkin"},"dateCreated":"2017-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing and important film!","reviewBody":"Warning: This Drug May Kill You is an absolutely outstanding film. What is happening with prescription medications and how addictive they can become is horrifying. This film could save the life of one of your loved ones - it is a 100% MUST SEE! It is informative, smart, well paced, and brilliantly tells a hard, but "must be heard" story. Perri Peltz did an exceptional job bring this very sad, but real story to life. She is to be congratulated. Amazing work! If you know anyone who takes too may pain killers or is using heroin - help them by seeing this incredible film. You could save a life.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":520,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2017-05-01","keywords":"title directed by female","director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0671367/","name":"Perri Peltz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0139821/"}],"duration":"PT59M"}</script><metacontent="

Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2433738/","name":"Wentworth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDkxZmFhMDAtMmIyZS00NjAwLThlYjctZDQwMWQwYzdlYWY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bea Smith is locked up while awaiting trial for the attempted murder of her husband and must learn how life works in prison.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2433738/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mastas1","dateCreated":"2013-05-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great re-make of a classic Aussie drama","reviewBody":"Initial skepticism of trying to remake a classic serial drama like Prisoner was quickly dispelled in the first few minutes of episode 1. This is a completely new take on a long running series from the 1980s with the necessary level of added grit needed in 2013. Whilst employing many of the well known character names; the "new" version has created juicy variations to the originals. Those familiar with the original series should not allow themselves to by put off in the early stages by casting of different types to play the original characters. Ep 1 was edgy, well paced and the acting overall was very good. If Wentworth can maintain the same intensity over its remaining 9 episodes of season 1, it will be a treat to watch. As well as seeing how the initial variation to different main characters develop, perhaps growing into their more familiar traits from the original series as the new series progresses. Clearly this re-make is attempting to tell the background story as to how the likes of Bea Smith, Vera Bennett, Meg Jackson and Frankie Doyle came to be like they were in the original Prisoner series.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-05-01","keywords":"jail,women in prison,prison,female prisoner,female convict","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040753/","name":"Kate Atkinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1319592/","name":"Katrina Milosevic","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0535741/","name":"Robbie Magasiva"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0357122/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914844/","name":"Reg Watson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1416718/","name":"Lara Radulovich"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer Wentworth Prison","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi872397593","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZhN2EzOTYtYmJkNS00MzRjLTg5YmYtNDJjNjVhMDg4ZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

Baby God: Directed by Hannah Olson. With Wendi Babst, Quincy Fortier, Brad Gulko, Cathy Holm. For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11916166/","name":"Baby God","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQyZTA0ZGQtN2NiZC00NmIxLWE4MWUtYzM0NmY0YjY4ZjRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIxMDY2NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. Now his secret is out and his children seek the truth about his motives and try to make sense of their own identities.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11916166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbankscma"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Why did he do it?","reviewBody":"This is a documentary not a mystery film, so I won't call this review a spoiler.

Why he did it may have been was partially answered, but not discussed was that we all want to be known for being successful. Fortier realized that with his sperm mixed in the chance of success increased.

As he became known for being successful (with lots of profit to boot) he kept doing what worked... mixing sperm specimens.

As mentioned, DNA testing was nonexistent at that time so he knew he'd be remembered for what he was: a VERY successful fertilization doctor.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime"],"datePublished":"2020-12-02","keywords":"children","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3083518233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGFjNmQ0OTctMTAzOS00YWMwLWEwZjktOWJhMWQzYjI0MDRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For more than 30 years, Dr. Quincy Fortier covertly used his own sperm to inseminate his fertility patients. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1578887, Title: Luck, --- Description: Luck: Created by David Milch. With Dustin Hoffman, Dennis Farina, John Ortiz, Richard Kind. A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1578887/","name":"Luck","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5MDUyMDY0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTAyMTUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A television series centered around characters who are tied to the same horse racing track.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1578887/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"SentientMeat","dateCreated":"2012-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"All-stars on all sides transport us to an exciting, sad world in style.","reviewBody":"LUCK is fast and stylish. Michael Mann is exec. producer of LUCK and director of the first episode. Mann is the writer/director of "Heat" and LUCK has the same pace and style. 

There is plenty of insider chatter here. The kind of dialogue that is second nature to the people associated with horse racing but that leaves the rest of us a bit dizzy. LUCK is the clash of very different characters and it gives Mann as much contrast as the cinematography that has become his signature. Washed up gamblers, hungry employee's, wealthy owners and the people one step from financial ruin or rejuvenation are painted in different colors of neon or grays as success and/or slime in all its forms contrast with the strength, beauty and earthiness of the central characters: Horses, fodder for the justification of so much excitement and sadness.

LUCK is a convergence of who's who at Santa Anita. I'm grateful that so many deserving thespians wanted in on this project. I'm sure they know much about their peers but their on-screen "history" with each other is believable. Can the script justify the talent? So far, yes. The writing seems to have as much good teeth as its all-star cast - pay attention and hold on.

This premier reminds me of "Mad Men" on AMC, a channel I ALSO got for free for the first 3 (enjoyable) episodes. I did not bite on AMC but LUCK is making a good argument for HBO.

I'm certain the language will soak in with the rest of the story but I have the inside on "bug", as the agent calls the young Jockey. "Bug" is a moniker used for substitute jockey's. Any rookie that replaces an expected rider is noted on a racing program with an asterisk and an asterisk looks like a bug (the definition is courtesy of David Milch).","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5698,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2012-01-29","keywords":"horse race,horse trainer,organized crime,gambling,racetrack","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000163/","name":"Dustin Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001199/","name":"Dennis Farina","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651159/","name":"John Ortiz"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035930/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586965/","name":"David Milch"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Luck","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3881213465","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4NzczOTQ0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTU5NjUxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A promo for the new HBO series centered around characters tied to the same horse-racing track. "</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 5923012, Title: Here and Now, --- Description: Here and Now: Created by Alan Ball. With Tim Robbins, Holly Hunter, Daniel Zovatto, Jerrika Hinton. A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5923012/","name":"Here and Now","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDIwOTg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAxMzc1NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 Americ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5923012/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"WorldProxy","dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing, Interesting, Well Written","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under (Alan Ball) brought me here. I was really disappointed it got cancelled. The characters were interesting, the stories were interesting, I enjoyed the social diversity and awareness of issues and how different groups reacted to everything. I liked the supernatural element and I'm a huge fan of Peter Macdissi. What I don't like is tricked out right-wingers who write reviews and are too stupid to understand that it's a TV show on HBO where you can have Gay, Muslim, Asian, Black, White, Latin, and homeless characters involved in relationships and have love for each other, but fail to mention the hate and racism of Nazi wannabe society, which by the way is a real problem in real life as well as in the show. If you're too sensitive and fragile for this sort of thing, then stick to whatever safe and insipid programs that appeal to your comfortable taste. Either that or shave your beard, lose the smelly red hat and grow a brain. I also think the show is self-aware, conscience, multi-layered, smart and definitely keeps you involved.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4733,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-02-11","keywords":"transvestite,racism,chlamydia,homophobia,progressivism","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4683167/","name":"Daniel Zovatto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Premieres Tonight, 9/8c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1020377113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A multi-racial family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Somalia, Vietnam and Colombia and one biological child, find their bonds tested when one of the children begins seeing things which the rest cannot."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 5923012, Title: Here and Now, --- Description: Here and Now: Created by Alan Ball. With Tim Robbins, Holly Hunter, Daniel Zovatto, Jerrika Hinton. A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 America." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5923012/","name":"Here and Now","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDIwOTg4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTAxMzc1NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dark dramedy about a progressive Portlandian family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Liberia, Vietnam and Colombia, and one biological daughter, who find their sanity tested and values challenged in 2018 Americ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5923012/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"WorldProxy","dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intriguing, Interesting, Well Written","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under (Alan Ball) brought me here. I was really disappointed it got cancelled. The characters were interesting, the stories were interesting, I enjoyed the social diversity and awareness of issues and how different groups reacted to everything. I liked the supernatural element and I'm a huge fan of Peter Macdissi. What I don't like is tricked out right-wingers who write reviews and are too stupid to understand that it's a TV show on HBO where you can have Gay, Muslim, Asian, Black, White, Latin, and homeless characters involved in relationships and have love for each other, but fail to mention the hate and racism of Nazi wannabe society, which by the way is a real problem in real life as well as in the show. If you're too sensitive and fragile for this sort of thing, then stick to whatever safe and insipid programs that appeal to your comfortable taste. Either that or shave your beard, lose the smelly red hat and grow a brain. I also think the show is self-aware, conscience, multi-layered, smart and definitely keeps you involved.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4733,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2018-02-11","keywords":"transvestite,racism,chlamydia,homophobia,progressivism","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4683167/","name":"Daniel Zovatto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Premieres Tonight, 9/8c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1020377113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiMTdkOTktZjY1OS00ZWRmLWFmYzItOGU1OTcyMzlkNWY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A multi-racial family made up of husband, wife, three adopted children from Somalia, Vietnam and Colombia and one biological child, find their bonds tested when one of the children begins seeing things which the rest cannot."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis","dateCreated":"2009-02-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Show Does The Impossible","reviewBody":"When using superlatives with this show it is totally fair. This show does something all other movies, shows, etc cannot do: it can safely apply any genre and still function as a deep and very entertaining show. As everybody episode goes by the show only becomes more addictive. It taps into almost every aspect of life. Every emotion is shown; love, hate, forgiveness, triumph and the list goes on and on. In fact this show depicts life the most realistically. The strangeness and peculiarity of the many themes perfectly displays the confusion in life and how it affects us. The show displays confusion in the clearest way making it almost impossible not to some how relate to the characters in the show. Not to mention also the series ends on one finest note you will ever see not just satisfying the viewer but taking the show to a level far and above anything else I have ever seen before. This show does the impossible twice over.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":127784,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. In a remote town in Iceland, Police desperately try to solve a crime as a powerful storm descends upon the town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3561180/","name":"Ófærð","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwOTQ0OTIwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTAwODY2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a remote town in Iceland, Police desperately try to solve a crime as a powerful storm descends upon the town.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3561180/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"peterrichboy","dateCreated":"2017-07-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cold and creepy!","reviewBody":"Being a fan of Nordic noir I thought I would give this series a go and I'm glad I did. Trapped is every bit as good as anything Icelands Scandinavian neighbours have given us. Set in a small port on the Icelandic coast a spate of murders take place taking the local police force out of there comfort zone. Not that this stops the local head of police played by the excellent Olafa Olafson. With no help from the mainland due to the freezing weather he single handily attempts to track down the perpetrator. Trapped is well written,acted and beautifully shot so much so it's the first show that's so cold it makes me want to put a jumper on just watching it! Highly recommended 9/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18830,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2015-12-27","keywords":"iceland,snowstorm,coastal town,police officer,murder investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0959963/","name":"Ólafur Darri Ólafsson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1800322/","name":"Ilmur Kristjánsdóttir","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797614/","name":"Ingvar Sigurdsson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0450900/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035146/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0466349/","name":"Baltasar Kormákur"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OVS]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2553133593","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFmZjM2YzAtNzg2Mi00OGM3LWEzY2QtZWEwNzk4ZTRkODA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFmZjM2YzAtNzg2Mi00OGM3LWEzY2QtZWEwNzk4ZTRkODA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chaos Walking
Chaos Walking
programme.desc:
Chaos Walking: Directed by Doug Liman. With Tom Holland, Daisy Ridley, Demián Bichir, David Oyelowo. Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2076822/","name":"Chaos Walking","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcxYTk3MWQtZThlMS00ZjQ0LTg0NjktNGVkNWM2MTAyYWJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2076822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rainfollower-95-646324"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dull and dumb","reviewBody":"This a very boring, straightforward story set in a strange, pointless and incoherent world. It will leave a lot of unanswered questions in the end unless you read all the books beforehand. What's worse, all these special properties of the world are pointless in terms of world and character development. All you see is just another Wild West with a bit of funny Noise effects and some (very little!) alien fauna, and all this never impacts the story in any meaningful way.

Tom Holland and Mads Mikkelsen are good, as expected. Even Daisy Ridley is more or less okay. Their characters are not. You can understand what drives the young Todd, he's the most developed one, still, there's a lot to reveal in his background, in his past, in his relations with the other settlers of his town. Others are worse than that. Most of them talk riddles all the time, just like in a teenager's fan fiction, and the Noise never helps there.

Another problem is the lack of reason, the lack of sense. There's just a lot of tiny little details that clearly make no sense, both in character's judgement, in their actions and in the world itself.

Overall. This is bad as a tale. This is bad science fiction. And this is also bad in terms of storytelling. What I liked: the new fresh world, and the beautiful visuals. But... that's all.

PS: No really, I've been looking at my wrist watch roughly at the middle, trying to recall how long the movie should be overall. If I had been alone, I would have probably walked out of the cinema then.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-03-05","keywords":"wilderness,based on young adult novel,mind reading,interplanetary,alien creature","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3486171417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a dystopian colony on a planet called New World, Todd Hewitt (Tom Holland) has grown up believing a virus has killed all women and given all living creatures the ability to read each other’s minds and hear each other's thoughts in a stream of images, words and sounds called "the Noise."

programme.review: --- Actors: Tom Holland (role=Todd), Daisy Ridley (role=Viola), Demián Bichir (role=Ben), David Oyelowo (role=Aaron), Kurt Sutter (role=Cillian), Cynthia Erivo (role=Hildy), Bethany Anne Lind (role=Karyssa Hewitt), Mads Mikkelsen (role=Mayor Prentiss), Nick Jonas (role=Davy Prentiss, Jr.), Ray McKinnon (role=Matthew), Vincent Leclerc (role=Daws), Blane Crockarell (role=Young Todd)

IMDb data; ttnr: 2076822, Title: Chaos Walking, --- Description: Chaos Walking: Directed by Doug Liman. With Tom Holland, Daisy Ridley, Demián Bichir, David Oyelowo. Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2076822/","name":"Chaos Walking","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcxYTk3MWQtZThlMS00ZjQ0LTg0NjktNGVkNWM2MTAyYWJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Two unlikely companions embark on a perilous adventure through the badlands of an unexplored planet as they try to escape a dangerous and disorienting reality where all thoughts are seen and heard by everyone.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2076822/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rainfollower-95-646324","dateCreated":"2021-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dull and dumb","reviewBody":"This a very boring, straightforward story set in a strange, pointless and incoherent world. It will leave a lot of unanswered questions in the end unless you read all the books beforehand. What's worse, all these special properties of the world are pointless in terms of world and character development. All you see is just another Wild West with a bit of funny Noise effects and some (very little!) alien fauna, and all this never impacts the story in any meaningful way.

Tom Holland and Mads Mikkelsen are good, as expected. Even Daisy Ridley is more or less okay. Their characters are not. You can understand what drives the young Todd, he's the most developed one, still, there's a lot to reveal in his background, in his past, in his relations with the other settlers of his town. Others are worse than that. Most of them talk riddles all the time, just like in a teenager's fan fiction, and the Noise never helps there.

Another problem is the lack of reason, the lack of sense. There's just a lot of tiny little details that clearly make no sense, both in character's judgement, in their actions and in the world itself.

Overall. This is bad as a tale. This is bad science fiction. And this is also bad in terms of storytelling. What I liked: the new fresh world, and the beautiful visuals. But... that's all.

PS: No really, I've been looking at my wrist watch roughly at the middle, trying to recall how long the movie should be overall. If I had been alone, I would have probably walked out of the cinema then.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35398,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-03-05","keywords":"wilderness,based on young adult novel,mind reading,interplanetary,alien creature","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3486171417","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQwNWEzYWMtODAyYy00YjdmLTk3NzctZWQ2ZDJjMmQyOTExXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a dystopian colony on a planet called New World, Todd Hewitt (Tom Holland) has grown up believing a virus has killed all women and given all living creatures the ability to read each other’s minds and hear each other's thoughts in a stream of images, words and sounds called "the Noise."

programme.title: District 9
District 9
programme.desc:
District 9: Directed by Neill Blomkamp. With Sharlto Copley, Jason Cope, Nathalie Boltt, Sylvaine Strike. Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1136608/","name":"District 9","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ5MzFjYWMtMTMwNC00ZGU5LWI3YTQtYzhkMGExNGFlY2Q0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1136608/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviesleuth2"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A breath of fresh air in a time of bloated sequels and rip-offs!","reviewBody":"Ever since Neill Blomkamp was lined to do the film version of the "Halo" video game, he's become a household name with the fanboys. But as we all know, that project stalled and Blomkamp is no longer on board as a director. After that happened, Peter Jackson gave Blomkamp $30 million to make whatever movie he wanted. Blomkamp made this film, and it is a stunning debut.

Normally I despise remakes, but after viewing Blomkamp's short film, "Alive in Joburg," which served as the inspiration for this movie, I can say that calling "District 9" a remake of the short film is about as untrue as it is unfair. Even saying that Blomkamp used the short film as a jumping off point is pushing it (a lot). "District 9" takes the idea and runs with it, not even remembering to pass "Go" and collect 200 dollars.

South Africa, present day. A spaceship has been hovering over Johannesburg, South Africa, for the past 20 or so years. The aliens were brought down and nourished back to health, but people's apprehension with the new beings caused major clashes, and the visitors, known as "prawns" were moved into a slum called District 9. Today, the shady corporation Multi-National United has decided to move the prawns to District 10, and to make sure that it's handled legally, they enlist Wikus Van Der Merwe (Sharlto Copley) to oversee it. Suffice it to say, things don't go as planned.

"District 9" is not flawless, but it's so good that I'm more than willing to look the other way at any of its "flaws." But the best part of it is that it takes chances. In broad strokes, the story is familiar, but the details and execution are completely new.

One of the best things that I liked is how Blomkamp portrays people reacting to the aliens. Everything that the people do in response to them is completely credible. I don't want to give anything away, but the way that the people "acted" in response to the coming of the prawns is so believable it's almost chilling. "Interviews" with people who worked with Wikus and were involved in the story enhance this effect.

Meanwhile, we have Wikus guiding us through the story. Wikus is eager, but he's not the brightest bulb in the bunch. Sharlto Copley is excellent as Wikus. Copley does a great job playing a poster boy for MNU, but Wikus is also likable, and that's important.

"District 9" is a mixture of a million ideas all thrown together at once. Past movies have done this and sunk because of it, but "District 9" succeeds because they're competently explained and portrayed. A few technical things cause this to get an 8 instead of a 10 (for example, one scene is interesting, but it's out of place, and the film's big transition doesn't go very well), but it's still a highly recommendable film. And for once, the shaking camera is used effectively.

Do I think that Blomkamp should direct "Halo?" While there's no question that he could do it, and make a great movie out of the game, I don't think he's the right man for the job. I don't think "Halo" would look good as a grainy documentary. But that's just me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":658294,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-12-23","keywords":"alien,social commentary,mockumentary,based on short film,removing fingernail","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"District 9: TV Spot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3896050201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NzE1MDA5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM4MDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NzE1MDA5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTM4MDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A TV trailer for District 9"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1663205/","name":"Sharlto Copley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3107870/","name":"David James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2271261/","name":"Jason Cope"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088955/","name":"Neill Blomkamp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286672/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046203/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088955/","name":"Neill Blomkamp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2833612/","name":"Terri Tatchell"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Straw Dogs
Straw Dogs – Wer Gewalt sät
programme.desc:
Straw Dogs: Directed by Rod Lurie. With James Marsden, Kate Bosworth, Alexander Skarsgård, James Woods. Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0999913/","name":"Straw Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQ1MTk5ODIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzU1MzgyMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0999913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ManBehindTheMask63"},"dateCreated":"2011-09-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Intense film, great acting, true to the original","reviewBody":"Sam Peckinpah's original classic is one of my favorite thrillers. So when I heard they were remaking "Straw dogs", I wasn't surprised but somewhat leery of having high expectations. But once I read the casting and saw the trailer, I became excited for the remake. I was not let down. "Straw Dogs" is one of the most intense films I've seen in years.

"Straw Dogs" (2011) did right, what so many other remakes do wrong. It didn't alter the story drastically or disrespect the original's legacy. The director simply rebooted and modernized the tale for a new generation. Everything that shocked you and every scene you loved in the original is still in the remake. The change of setting actually benefited the film and gave it a little more realism in terms of violence and social dysfunction.

The violence is high and the rape scene is disturbing. But the acting was top notch by everyone involved. James Marsden did a great job playing the weak, timid, and quiet intellectual who eventually turns into the strong, violent, and "manly" protector. His performance was very "Hoffman" essque but he still made the role his own. I think a lot of girls came to the film solely for Alexander Skarsgard (true blood fans) and they were generally disturbed by his turn as a heel. There were a lot of gasps during a particular bear trap scene. Bosworth, Woods, and Purcell were all perfect in their roles as well.

"Straw Dogs" is as raw, interesting, and powerful as it's original. A film that deals with aggression, manhood, and human connections pushed to the extremes. There are many subtleties in the performances and some great metaphorical images. A great thriller that literally intensifies until it's satisfying climax. Best film I've seen in months."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33756,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-09-16","keywords":"rape,sexual humiliation,rape victim,gang rape,panties pulled down","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi174103833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005188/","name":"James Marsden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0098378/","name":"Kate Bosworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002907/","name":"Alexander Skarsgård"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089304/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329051/","name":"David Zelag Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001603/","name":"Sam Peckinpah"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

Best film I've seen in months.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33756,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-09-16","keywords":"rape,sexual humiliation,rape victim,gang rape,panties pulled down","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi174103833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNzU4MDI4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDI5MzQzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"L.A. screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. programme.title: Swelter
Swelter
programme.desc:
Swelter: Directed by Keith Parmer. With Alfred Molina, Jean-Claude Van Damme, Courtney Hope, Lennie James. Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2112277/","name":"Swelter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4OTQ4Nzg4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk0MTQyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2112277/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shroyertour"},"dateCreated":"2014-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good - Worth a Watch","reviewBody":"Back in the day, a movie starring Jean-Claude Van Damme was an action flick with lots of martial arts. He was the good guy in it. And it actually starred Van Damme.

More recently, Van Damme has made some movies with him as a flawed protagonist, and then several more as the main bad guy.

This movie is a decent Drama/Suspense film, with Van Damme as a secondary character, and a tries-to-be-good bad guy. He is just above the "character actor" role, probably in my mind only because he is JCVD.

The bad guys here go looking for the guy who barely escaped and still has the money, after some hold-up years ago where everyone else goes to prison to stew and fester about their revenge. There are enough variations on this basic idea to keep the viewer interested. Lennie James does a good job as the town Sheriff, easy going, hard to ruffle, and who you somehow know you just don't want to mess with. There is actually a little action here and there, but it is realistic (no martial arts) and serves mostly to add to the suspense.

With no JCVD, this would be a movie worth a watch. An interesting plot, with good acting, and nice cinematography. Seeing JCVD do his "actual acting" thing is also fairly enjoyable. He manages to entertain with his french (Belgian) accent and a simmering manner that seems to add depth even to a character that has little.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3039,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-05-22","keywords":"neo western,neo noir,gangster,low budget,police shootout","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Swelter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2478943257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNTFiN2UtMDc1Ny00MzZkLTg0MjEtMjE0NGFmYmUwMTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Swelter"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000241/","name":"Jean-Claude Van Damme"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890824/","name":"Courtney Hope"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0404324/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414337/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0414739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2978815/","name":"Keith Parmer"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ironclad
Ironclad – Bis zum letzten Krieger
programme.desc:
Ironclad: Directed by Jonathan English. With James Purefoy, Brian Cox, Kate Mara, Derek Jacobi. In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1233301/","name":"Ironclad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NTU2NTI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDYzOTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1233301/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"intelearts"},"dateCreated":"2011-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"437th Review: Blood and Valour (But mostly blood)","reviewBody":"Definitely shot in a Ridley Scott fashion this is an effective medieval pot-boiler with some moral vision and lots and lots of gruesome full-on combat scenes - without a doubt some of the more bone-crunching, blood squelching fights of recent memory.

Is a great movie? No. It never quite delivers on its promise, and though extremely competent it just can't quite produce that true magic that better films can. It is, however, a highly competent and interesting historical drama. I have some quibbles with costuming etc; but that kind of goes with the territory.

All in all, this is a full-on medieval siege account of the Siege of Rochester -it is well made is most respects and if medieval battles are your thing then you'll be into it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41376,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2011-03-04","keywords":"13th century,england,knight,castle,king","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ironclad","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4273052697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Mzk5NDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjIxNTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Mzk5NDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjIxNTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 13th century, a determined group of Knights Templar defends Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316079/","name":"Paul Giamatti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002076/","name":"Jason Flemyng"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0238245/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143763/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170376/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440936/","name":"Erick Kastel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1893753/","name":"Stephen McDool"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="
