programme.title: Eat Pray Love
Eat, Pray, Love
programme.desc: Eat Pray Love: Directed by Ryan Murphy. With Julia Roberts, I. Gusti Ayu Puspawati, Hadi Subiyanto, Billy Crudup. A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0879870/","name":"Eat Pray Love","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5NDkyNzkyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDQyNDk0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0879870/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mystic Julia","reviewBody":"Most people I know are going to see this film for Julia Roberts. It is that mysterious link that film stars create with their audiences. We develop a sort of craving to see them again. So a new Julia Roberts movie? Sure. Absolutely. I'm only a few years younger than Julia Roberts which means we have grown together. So, to see her play a woman facing a sort of middle age crisis makes you look inwards with a smile, the nervous kind. I must also say I'm a guy, heterosexual, but not fanatically so. I don't have the fears that, Jay Leno for instance, shows, when confronted by a "chick flick" If anything "Eat Pray Love" proves that men and women are not that far apart, we simply deal with the same problems in different ways. Here, the filmmakers don't shy away from the conflict and the balance is real. Julia's husband, played beautifully by Billy Crudup, accuses her of leaving the marriage without an explanation. He is the one with the broken heart. In Italy, Julia eats and our own gastric juices start to do their thing. I glanced at my watch, I was ready to run into the nearest Italian restaurant and have a relationship with a pizza myself. Italy, Rome and even Naples look so clean that I hardly recognized it. CGI? Luca Argentero plays Julia's tutor/tourist guide. He is a good looking guy that after appearing in the Italian version of the Big Brother reality show, he became a sort of local movie star and shows promising acting chops. Here, strangely enough, he looks small but charming all the same. India brings the wonderful Richard Jenkins and a solid piece of advise: "don't give up on love" Bali, well, Bali is something else and it is there that Javier Bardem comes into the picture and provides us with the best scene in the film. I'm not going to tell you what it is but let me just say that involves his son and gives us, finally, a side of Julia we didn't know how much we missed. Empathy. Feeling something for somebody else's feelings. I think I may see the film a second time just to see that scene again. I also should mention that James Franco plays a young actor - not what I call a stretch - considering he is my favorite of the young actors around. I will challenge other members of my sex to go and see it. Not to be afraid to feel identified or even chocked up. I can assure you it's not going to diminish you manliness in any way and will awake your appetites, big time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":93565,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-10-06","keywords":"emotional balance,indonesia,inner peace,young woman,usa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Eat Pray Love: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2996176409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzNTU5MTczNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk0NTM2Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Happily married Elizabeth Gilbert (Roberts) takes a right turn in her life by enduring a painful divorce and proceeding to take a round-the-world journey of self-enlightenment and fulfillment. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000849/","name":"Javier Bardem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136967/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087432/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759022/","name":"Jennifer Salt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2418691/","name":"Elizabeth Gilbert"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Holly Slept Over
Im Bett mit Holly
programme.desc: Holly Slept Over: Directed by Joshua Friedlander. With Josh Lawson, Nathalie Emmanuel, Britt Lower, Erinn Hayes. This unconventional comedy follows the relationship struggles of a married couple trying to conceive, their friends who have lost their spark, and the tension that ensues when an old college roommate stays over for the weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7453044/","name":"Holly Slept Over","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYxMjA3MTQtNmNhNS00ZjEwLTkyM2MtOWNmNDMxYTMxMWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTU3MjU4ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"This unconventional comedy follows the relationship struggles of a married couple trying to conceive, their friends who have lost their spark, and the tension that ensues when an old college roommate stays over for the weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7453044/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"redblue-63741"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny, touching, and felt very real at the same time","reviewBody":"It might be because I'm the perfect age group for this, but this movie was so honest that it felt good. Sexuality and relationships are inherently messy things, and this movie does everything justice while keeping things funny. I think the target audience for a movie like this might be rather small though, it doesn't really fall into any traditional categories or genres. This is maybe why there are some very negative reviews, but the acting is phenomenal, you identify or care about the characters, and it's wholeheartedly a good simple movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1598,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-03-03","keywords":"written by director,husband wife relationship,three word title,male objectification,bare chested male","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Holly Slept Over","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2120204057","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRiZWY2YWEtZWMwNy00MjA3LWE0MmEtZWFmNzA0NGEyZjAxXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRiZWY2YWEtZWMwNy00MjA3LWE0MmEtZWFmNzA0NGEyZjAxXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493257/","name":"Josh Lawson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2812026/","name":"Nathalie Emmanuel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3138882/","name":"Britt Lower"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1010187/","name":"Joshua Friedlander"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0658532/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1010187/","name":"Joshua Friedlander"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chef
Kiss the Cook – So schmeckt das Leben
programme.desc: Chef: Directed by Jon Favreau. With Jon Favreau, John Leguizamo, Bobby Cannavale, Emjay Anthony. A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2883512/","name":"Chef","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTQyNDQwMjYtZTY5YS00MGU2LWE5NzctMjM4Y2IyYjkwMjNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A head chef quits his restaurant job and buys a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2883512/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Morpheus911"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Father and Son Movie","reviewBody":"I guess some people thought this movie was long and boring. Even some said acting was kind of bad. Well I think the total opposite of this. And I cannot see why anyone would think otherwise. This movie as basic as the plots and story lines were, totally kept my interest. I think it's Jon Favreau's best movie ever. It's a masterpiece. This could be a cult classic for Father's Day, like It's A Wonderful Life is for Christmas. Of course the general sway of Hollywood shun's on a great family life. However Jon Fav didn't give a crap and he decided to celebrate how to celebrate living again. Yeah not much going on but if you don't feel good after watching this then you have a crusty heart and your problems have deep rooted issues. \n\nI thought this was probably one of the better movies I have seen all year. Personally. I believe we really - really need more movies like this to remind us about how precious life really is and how to enjoy special moments just eating a real beignet from New Orlean's French Quarter, and in search of the perfect Cuban sandwich recipe, and perfecting the ultimate beef brisket slider. I totally was impressed by this movie for it's full hour and fifty minutes. I loved a great - feel good - movie - - I recommend for any dad and most everyone to see it This will surely restore a sense of how important a support group of family and good friends can be. Great job Jon Favreau! I kind of thought you were like Hollywood stuck up before seeing this movie. Now I know you are a real guy and cool ass family man.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":207143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-05-30","keywords":"food truck,chef,food,food blogger,parent child relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3075386649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzMjcxNjY2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI2NDkxMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzMjcxNjY2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI2NDkxMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chef who loses his restaurant job starts up a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0269463/","name":"Jon Favreau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000375/","name":"Robert Downey Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0269463/","name":"Jon Favreau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0335687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008347/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0364637/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0269463/","name":"Jon Favreau"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

I loved a great - feel good - movie - - I recommend for any dad and most everyone to see it This will surely restore a sense of how important a support group of family and good friends can be. programme.title: Step Up
Step Up
programme.desc: Step Up: Directed by Anne Fletcher. With Channing Tatum, Jenna Dewan, Damaine Radcliff, De'Shawn Washington. Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462590/","name":"Step Up","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzMzVhODgtOTc1NS00MmY3LWI3OGUtN2ZjNDEwM2ExZjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"screenwriter-14"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"STEP UP to a magical film of dance, diversity, rhythm and blues","reviewBody":"What a wonderful surprise to find such a terrific film of dance and music in STEP UP and the actors/dancers were out of this world. Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan are magic on the screen and the music is sensational. My friend, Alia, from UCLA, had raved about this film and wanted me to see it, and I am so glad that I did. I found not only the music and dancing, but the story set in the jungle of a big city of young black men and a young white man struggling to survive and come up with fulfilling lives, to be a journey that is true to the lives of so many young men and women today in metropolitan cities in the USA.\n\nDuane Adler and Melissa Rosenberg have created a film in STEP UP that just hits your heart and soul with the character development created through the actors music and dance, and the sets and costumes which fit each character. I didn't want this film to end, but the last scene is just the one you wanted to see and feel. With STEP UP, you have a strong story, incredible music, wonderful young actors in a diverse world, and the hope that now their young lives can really begin. Loved this film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114786,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2007-02-07","keywords":"title directed by female,dance school,dance movie,disney,community service","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1820374553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU1NzU5MjkwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5NDkxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU1NzU5MjkwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk5NDkxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Step Up"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1475594/","name":"Channing Tatum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1564087/","name":"Jenna Dewan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1690482/","name":"Damaine Radcliff"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281945/","name":"Anne Fletcher"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163665/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0012137/","name":"Duane Adler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0742279/","name":"Melissa Rosenberg"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vorstadtkrokodile
Vorstadtkrokodile
programme.desc: Vorstadtkrokodile: Directed by Christian Ditter. With Nick Romeo Reimann, Fabian Halbig, Leonie Tepe, Manuel Steitz. Hannes wants to be a member of the crocodiles. To be a part of them he has to do something dangerous. When he is finally a member of them they experience dangerous adventures together." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0803100/","name":"Vorstadtkrokodile","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0NjA2NTU0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY1NDY1Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hannes wants to be a member of the crocodiles. To be a part of them he has to do something dangerous. When he is finally a member of them they experience dangerous adventures together.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0803100/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jannispetersen"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautiful and moving modern version!","reviewBody":"I didn't know what to expect of the filmatisation of the well-known German novel Vorstadtkrokodile. What I actually can remember is that when I read this novel as a child, I back then thought of, it would be great as a movie. So when I saw this movie is in the cinemas, I had to watch it. And I'm very glad to have done so! First of all the cast is great! Axel Stein does a really great job and also Semmelrogge is very funny in his short scene. I didn't know any of the youngsters, but all of them played their part very well - you instantly buy their roles the way they play them! And then there is the modernization of the context. Enormeausly well-done! Many nice gags, where I laughed out loud! This is a movie for everyone: the youngsters, young adults (like me, I'm in the middle of my twenties) and the elder generation! I hope you have read the novel, but if you haven't, I'm sure you are eager to do, after you watched this fantastic movie.\n\nHeck! I even caught myself gladly smiling at the very end!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1248,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2009-03-26","keywords":"first part,animal in title,based on novel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2180198/","name":"Nick Romeo Reimann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2526264/","name":"Fabian Halbig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3036132/","name":"Leonie Tepe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228542/","name":"Christian Ditter"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035336/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228542/","name":"Christian Ditter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0728894/","name":"Martin Ritzenhoff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0902149/","name":"Max von der Grün"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Vorstadtkrokodile 2
Vorstadtkrokodile 2
programme.desc:
Vorstadtkrokodile 2: Directed by Christian Ditter. programme.desc: Vorstadtkrokodile 3: Directed by Wolfgang Groos. With Nick Romeo Reimann, Fabian Halbig, Leonie Tepe, Manuel Steitz. The Crocodiles regroup and plan a prison break. It's an emergency and Frank needs his brother's help, but Denis sits in jail." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1692503/","name":"Vorstadtkrokodile 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAyNjY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTMwMjA1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Crocodiles regroup and plan a prison break. It's an emergency and Frank needs his brother's help, but Denis sits in jail.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1692503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"One last time","reviewBody":"The kids are all grown up ... well they were not when this movie was made. Not entirely at least. Still a little bit older than when they started making them. So part 3 concludes their journey. And is as dramatic as they get. The inciting incident does not seem that big ... but turns out it is .. life an death and all that.\n\nHaving said that, the movie is still overall not riddled with heavy drama, even with that hanging over their heads, there is time for jealousy and other issues one might have growing up. We get our villains back from the first one, but this time around ... well we sort of hope they have grown up too ... not just physically but metaphorically speaking ... I reckon there is not too much mystery or things you'll be surprised will happen in the journey of the movie. Still a neat little movie that is mainly aimed at younger people.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-01-20","keywords":"boy in a wheelchair,overalls,stutterer,outtakes during end credits,working mom","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2180198/","name":"Nick Romeo Reimann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2526264/","name":"Fabian Halbig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3036132/","name":"Leonie Tepe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0343185/","name":"Wolfgang Groos"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035336/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0228542/","name":"Christian Ditter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0046910/","name":"Thomas Bahmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0381074/","name":"Ralf Hertwig"}],"duration":"PT1H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier
Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier
programme.desc: Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier: Directed by Mike Marzuk. With Allegra Tinnefeld, Marinus Hohmann, Ron Antony Renzenbrink, Amelie Lammers. En route to a party they are not keen on attending, the Famous Five are almost relieved when Aunt Fanny's car breaks down, stranding them in a small town. To pass the time, they visit the local natural history museum, where some newly-discovered dinosaur bones are being unveiled. Here they meet Marty, who tells them that his father, long dead, supposedly found a complete dinosaur skeleton and made a map of its whereabouts. Unfortunately the map has been stolen. Unable to let a good mystery go unsolved, George, Julian, Dick, Anne and Timmy, join a guided hike through the Valley of Dinosaurs. But their fact-finding mission soon turns into a race to find the dinosaur when they suspect that the thief is one of the group." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7158736/","name":"Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2ZlYTJiOGItNzBjNC00MGUyLWI2ZWUtMDNmNjU2ZWI5NTNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ3NzUxOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"En route to a party they are not keen on attending, the Famous Five are almost relieved when Aunt Fanny's car breaks down, stranding them in a small town. IMDb data; ttnr: 7158736, Title: Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier, --- Description: Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier: Directed by Mike Marzuk. With Allegra Tinnefeld, Marinus Hohmann, Ron Antony Renzenbrink, Amelie Lammers. En route to a party they are not keen on attending, the Famous Five are almost relieved when Aunt Fanny's car breaks down, stranding them in a small town. To pass the time, they visit the local natural history museum, where some newly-discovered dinosaur bones are being unveiled. Here they meet Marty, who tells them that his father, long dead, supposedly found a complete dinosaur skeleton and made a map of its whereabouts. Unfortunately the map has been stolen. Unable to let a good mystery go unsolved, George, Julian, Dick, Anne and Timmy, join a guided hike through the Valley of Dinosaurs. But their fact-finding mission soon turns into a race to find the dinosaur when they suspect that the thief is one of the group." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7158736/","name":"Fünf Freunde und das Tal der Dinosaurier","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2ZlYTJiOGItNzBjNC00MGUyLWI2ZWUtMDNmNjU2ZWI5NTNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ3NzUxOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"En route to a party they are not keen on attending, the Famous Five are almost relieved when Aunt Fanny's car breaks down, stranding them in a small town. programme.title: Die Drei !!
Die Drei !!!
programme.desc:
Die Drei !!!: Directed by Viviane Andereggen. With Lilli Marie Lacher, Alexandra Petzschmann, Paula Renzler, Jürgen Vogel. Friends Franzi, Marieave and Kim planned to spend the summer rehearsing for a Peter Pan play, but when strange things start to happen at the theatre they take on the role of investigators." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8851630/","name":"Die Drei !!!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZjRlMTEtNTNhMy00YThlLTlmNmEtZjk4YThiOWI4YmI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTI5NzYzNzI0._V1_.jpg","description":"Friends Franzi, Marieave and Kim planned to spend the summer rehearsing for a Peter Pan play, but when strange things start to happen at the theatre they take on the role of investigators.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8851630/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thefbiboy"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best children-centered live action movie 2019 out of a established franchise","reviewBody":"I have to disagree with the one other review here on imdb: DIe Drei !!! is indeed a long thriving audio book series. While I'm not listing to the all female cast audio book, I watched this together with Benjamin Blümchen 2019 and TKKG 2019. I always was more of a TKKG Guy but personally I have to say that this production is *way better* than TKKG 2019.

The characters seem true to themselve (while I can't verify that since I do not listen to the original), I did get fouled by the dozend red herrings along the case and there were no real goofs involved (like in TKKG 2019 with basicley every actor being a goof once older than 19 except for Tim's mom)

 If you're fan of Die Drei !!! and like children-based crime stories, die Drei !!! is a must see.

Parents beware: There is one time a character said a foul world, but besides that, there is really nothing to be afraid of.

(I'm a soical worker in kindergarden)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":171,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"genre":["Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2019-07-25","keywords":"theater,overalls","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2480585753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxZDU4YTgtYmJkOS00MjcxLWI4YjQtZGVkMTQxNGYyNDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxZDU4YTgtYmJkOS00MjcxLWI4YjQtZGVkMTQxNGYyNDM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7660569/","name":"Lilli Marie Lacher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10256366/","name":"Alexandra Petzschmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8419274/","name":"Paula Renzler"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5899290/","name":"Viviane Andereggen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035336/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6592898/","name":"Sina Flammang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8855280/","name":"Doris Laske"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 3 Generations
Alle Farben des Lebens
programme.desc:
3 Generations: Directed by Gaby Dellal. With Elle Fanning, Linda Emond, Susan Sarandon, Naomi Watts. After Ray decides to transition from female to male, Ray's mother, Maggie, must come to terms with the decision while tracking down Ray's biological father to get his legal consent." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4158624/","name":"3 Generations","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1MTIwOTMwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODQzNjY5MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Ray decides to transition from female to male, Ray's mother, Maggie, must come to terms with the decision while tracking down Ray's biological father to get his legal consent.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4158624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nina661"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Teenagers","reviewBody":"It's a fascinating story about a fragile girl whose only desire is to be a boy and the ramifications this decision has on her family. Ella Fanning displays great teenage angst - throwing tantrums, manipulation, sarcasm, selfishness, it's all there.

Naomi Watts is the stand out, struggling to support her daughter's situation while juggling her own interesting relationships with her ex partners and mothers. Everyone performed their parts well, Susan Sarandon has a minimal presence throughout the film yet is memorable.

I'd have liked to have seen Ray/Ramona's mental instability addressed in the film as you never really understand why she wants to be a boy other than she's merely wanted it so since she was a little girl. Maybe that's all there is to it?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6455,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-29","keywords":"female to male transition,transgender teen,gender transition,transgender,lesbian grandmother","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"About Ray","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1334754073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc1NmNiODQtODdiOC00MjQwLWI1MGUtMmIyYjE4ODRjN2Y1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc1NmNiODQtODdiOC00MjQwLWI1MGUtMmIyYjE4ODRjN2Y1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for About Ray"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915208/","name":"Naomi Watts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1102577/","name":"Elle Fanning"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000215/","name":"Susan Sarandon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0217433/","name":"Gaby Dellal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126619/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208137/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2859868/","name":"Nikole Beckwith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0217433/","name":"Gaby Dellal"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

A holiday romantic comedy that captures the range of emotions tied to wanting your family's acceptance, being true to yourself, and trying not to ruin Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8522006/","name":"Happiest Season","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDgyZDNiZGEtYmQ4NC00NzU5LTllODQtNjIwMGY2NDYyNGQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A holiday romantic comedy that captures the range of emotions tied to wanting your family's acceptance, being true to yourself, and trying not to ruin Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8522006/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alicianora"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really quite great!","reviewBody":"I was impressed with this film considering all of the big name actors/actresses in it. programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
The Edge of Seventeen – Das Jahr der Entscheidung
programme.desc: The Edge of Seventeen: Directed by Kelly Fremon Craig. With Hailee Steinfeld, Haley Lu Richardson, Blake Jenner, Kyra Sedgwick. High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1878870/","name":"The Edge of Seventeen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE2NjE4NjYyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk3MjQ0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1878870/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jackcwelch23"},"dateCreated":"2017-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Doesn't hit as hard as it should","reviewBody":"I know most people would have felt sympathy for Nadine. I personally wanted her to follow through with her suicide threats at times. I always struggle to connect with protagonists who hate themselves and actively try to make situations worse by saying the wrong thing. It comes from an attention seeking place and is inherently self absorbed. Hailee Steinfeld is fantastic playing her of course, I don't fault her performance for a second. She was just not much of a character to root for. From what we see Darrian really only insults her after she insults him first, and for the most part just wants to live his life, he isn't a complete alpha male asshole who thrives on power, just a kid who happened to be born good looking and thus got what most of us want, popularity. \n\nThe movie is good, but not great. It is not as powerful and memorable as recent teen dramas that came out in recent years. It also has clichéd silly music and sitcom moments where it really should have picked a tone and stuck with it. Also Krista's character is woefully underdeveloped. Would have been nice to see a few more scenes where they confide in each other about Nadine's behaviour. Woody Harrelson elevates this from a 6 to a 7 by just being Woody Harrelson. The man turns orange juice to whisky. This movie simply could have left more of an imprint than it does.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-11-18","keywords":"adolescence,coming of age film,scantily clad female,panties,white panties","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Now Playing","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi450082329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5MzY4Njg2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTY5MTM2MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5MzY4Njg2Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTY5MTM2MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2794962/","name":"Hailee Steinfeld"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4726634/","name":"Haley Lu Richardson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4296357/","name":"Blake Jenner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2609807/","name":"Kelly Fremon Craig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035761/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0099734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033486/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2609807/","name":"Kelly Fremon Craig"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

I personally wanted her to follow through with her suicide threats at times. I always struggle to connect with protagonists who hate themselves and actively try to make situations worse by saying the wrong thing. It comes from an attention seeking place and is inherently self absorbed. Hailee Steinfeld is fantastic playing her of course, I don't fault her performance for a second. She was just not much of a character to root for. From what we see Darrian really only insults her after she insults him first, and for the most part just wants to live his life, he isn't a complete alpha male asshole who thrives on power, just a kid who happened to be born good looking and thus got what most of us want, popularity. \n\nThe movie is good, but not great. It is not as powerful and memorable as recent teen dramas that came out in recent years. It also has clichéd silly music and sitcom moments where it really should have picked a tone and stuck with it. Also Krista's character is woefully underdeveloped. Would have been nice to see a few more scenes where they confide in each other about Nadine's behaviour. Woody Harrelson elevates this from a 6 to a 7 by just being Woody Harrelson. The man turns orange juice to whisky. programme.title: Greed
Greed
programme.desc: Greed: Directed by Michael Winterbottom. With Caroline Flack, Steve Coogan, David Mitchell, Isla Fisher. Satire about the world of the super-rich." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8972256/","name":"Greed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDUzZDc3ZGYtOWZmNi00ZWIyLWE3YTYtNjRmZWZhMDNmNjhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Satire about the world of the super-rich.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8972256/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thechair"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hmmm","reviewBody":"Winterbottom's stuff is always interesting but unfortunately this one fell at some obvious hurdles. For two thirds it was an effective satire with some good performances (Coogan, as ever, a hoot) and some funny lines but in the final furlong any semblance of subtlety was dropped for silly plot developments and cheap sentiment, bashing the audience over the head with a point that had already been well made. A shame.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-21","keywords":"husband wife relationship,fashion industry,fashion show,flashback within a flashback within a flashback,greece","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3277897497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE3YTYwNTItZDYwNy00OTk5LTg4MGEtZjFhMDMxMzJmYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE3YTYwNTItZDYwNy00OTk5LTg4MGEtZjFhMDMxMzJmYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Greed' tells the story of self-made British billionaire Sir Richard McCreadie (Steve Coogan), whose retail empire is in crisis. For 30 years he has ruled the world of retail fashion – bringing the high street to the catwalk and the catwalk to the high street – but after a damaging public inquiry, his image is tarnished. To save his reputation, he decides to bounce back with a highly publicized and extravagant party celebrating his 60th birthday on the Greek island of Mykonos. A satire on the grotesque inequality of wealth in the fashion industry, the film sees McCreadie’s rise and fall through the eyes of his biographer, Nick (David Mitchell).\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1102585/","name":"Caroline Flack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176869/","name":"Steve Coogan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593267/","name":"David Mitchell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103733/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0660299/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2366133/","name":"Sean Gray"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

More people needs to watch this show, it's a Polish thriller and it's as good as Dark.. The cast are great especially the main actor Leszek Lichota who plays Wiktor Rebrow. Kajillionaire: Directed by Miranda July. With Richard Jenkins, Debra Winger, Evan Rachel Wood, Patricia Belcher. A woman's life is turned upside down when her criminal parents invite an outsider to join them on a major heist they're planning." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8143990/","name":"Kajillionaire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkxYzUxMDQtZWRiNy00ZWUwLWIxYjMtNWExODBmMzRkZGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU1NzU3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman's life is turned upside down when her criminal parents invite an outsider to join them on a major heist they're planning.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8143990/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"coombsstephen"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting film if a little odd and slow","reviewBody":"The film is a little strange and often doesn't make a lot of sense but ,none the less, it is watchable and does draw you in.

The characters are OK and just about believable but overall the piece of the film is slow and it lacks a bit of direction.

Worth a watch but don't have high expectations.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15311,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-25","keywords":"father daughter relationship,heist,mother daughter relationship,title directed by female,family of criminals","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3764567577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ4YWQzMDAtZTkzYi00Yzc0LThjNWMtMjM3MDMzMDZlZGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ4YWQzMDAtZTkzYi00Yzc0LThjNWMtMjM3MDMzMDZlZGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"From acclaimed writer/director Miranda July comes a profoundly moving and wildly original comedy. programme.title: Greed
Greed
programme.desc: Greed: Directed by Michael Winterbottom. With Caroline Flack, Steve Coogan, David Mitchell, Isla Fisher. Satire about the world of the super-rich." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8972256/","name":"Greed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDUzZDc3ZGYtOWZmNi00ZWIyLWE3YTYtNjRmZWZhMDNmNjhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Satire about the world of the super-rich.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8972256/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thechair"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hmmm","reviewBody":"Winterbottom's stuff is always interesting but unfortunately this one fell at some obvious hurdles. For two thirds it was an effective satire with some good performances (Coogan, as ever, a hoot) and some funny lines but in the final furlong any semblance of subtlety was dropped for silly plot developments and cheap sentiment, bashing the audience over the head with a point that had already been well made. A shame.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-21","keywords":"husband wife relationship,fashion industry,fashion show,flashback within a flashback within a flashback,greece","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3277897497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE3YTYwNTItZDYwNy00OTk5LTg4MGEtZjFhMDMxMzJmYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE3YTYwNTItZDYwNy00OTk5LTg4MGEtZjFhMDMxMzJmYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Greed' tells the story of self-made British billionaire Sir Richard McCreadie (Steve Coogan), whose retail empire is in crisis. For 30 years he has ruled the world of retail fashion – bringing the high street to the catwalk and the catwalk to the high street – but after a damaging public inquiry, his image is tarnished. To save his reputation, he decides to bounce back with a highly publicized and extravagant party celebrating his 60th birthday on the Greek island of Mykonos. A satire on the grotesque inequality of wealth in the fashion industry, the film sees McCreadie’s rise and fall through the eyes of his biographer, Nick (David Mitchell).\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1102585/","name":"Caroline Flack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176869/","name":"Steve Coogan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593267/","name":"David Mitchell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103733/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0660299/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2366133/","name":"Sean Gray"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: De l'autre côté du lit
Auf der anderen Seite des Bettes
programme.desc: De l'autre côté du lit: Directed by Pascale Pouzadoux. With Sophie Marceau, Dany Boon, Antoine Duléry, Roland Giraud. To save their marriage, a man and a woman decide to exchange their lives for a year." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1275590/","name":"De l'autre côté du lit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGEwNTE3MzUtOWNmOS00N2Q2LWI2MDAtZGNhODI3NDM4N2U3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQzNzQxNzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"To save their marriage, a man and a woman decide to exchange their lives for a year.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1275590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aleena_m"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Take it for what it is","reviewBody":"Before deciding if I want to see a movie or not, I usually do 2 things: I check out the IMDb vote and I see the trailer. To tell you the truth I did this quite a long time ago for this one, so I looked at the vote again before hitting the play button. You can imagine that my expectations were quite low: a 5.2 out of 10 isn't that much and the 3 reviews out there were so critical. I decided to see it anyway imagining that I will at least have a different experience given that the movies I normally watch are Hollywood productions. I must say I actually enjoyed it! I took it as a comedy, not as a documentary! I saw people were complaining about the fact that the situations were highly unlikely or that the movie was inspired from a book and it didn't do it justice. Well movies rarely succeed in doing that as far as I know... Books and movies are 2 distinct experiences! I liked the fact that there was little or no vulgarity and a complete lack of fart/bodily fluids/coarse sex jokes that I see too often! I don't find those funny! It's way more difficult to make people laugh because of funny circumstances or truly intelligent or sarcastic lines! To wrap it up without giving anything away, take it as a light-hearted comedy and don't have too high expectations - you might actually enjoy it ;)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2594,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"role reversal,switched identity,f rated,singing in a car,family relationships","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000521/","name":"Sophie Marceau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0200702/","name":"Dany Boon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0241383/","name":"Antoine Duléry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0693903/","name":"Pascale Pouzadoux"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0233587/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079764/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0257823/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3248435/","name":"Alix Girod de l'Ain"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0693903/","name":"Pascale Pouzadoux"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897065/","name":"Grégoire Vigneron"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally..
Harry und Sally
programme.desc: When Harry Met Sally...: Directed by Rob Reiner. With Billy Crystal, Meg Ryan, Carrie Fisher, Bruno Kirby. Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0098635/","name":"When Harry Met Sally...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0ODEwNjM2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU2Mzg3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0098635/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"PyrolyticCarbon"},"dateCreated":"2002-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautiful film, giving hope to all those seemingly unrequited loves.","reviewBody":"Can you beat some of the lines in this film? As a guy, which I am, I identified with Harry's lines so much, and you can't help but side with him. The chemistry between the two actors, Billy Crystal and Meg Ryan is superb, and you believe in them when they talk, you feel for them when they look at each other. Even the friends are well casted, Carrie Fisher and Bruno Kirby. It's such relaxed acting and filming that you do nothing but watch these people fall in love, and pretty soon you feel like you're involved as well. With a fantastic soundtrack, direction, script and acting, it's a great film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":207102,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1989-07-21","keywords":"male female friendship,opposites attract,fake orgasm,new york,pessimist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi129743385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjYyZjk1ZDMtMGJmZC00YmI0LWJhYTYtYzA1MDcyN2JhOTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjYyZjk1ZDMtMGJmZC00YmI0LWJhYTYtYzA1MDcyN2JhOTU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000345/","name":"Billy Crystal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000212/","name":"Meg Ryan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000402/","name":"Carrie Fisher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001661/","name":"Rob Reiner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020346/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020346/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001188/","name":"Nora Ephron"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fack ju Göhte 3
Fack Ju Göhte 3
programme.desc:
Fack ju Göhte 3: Directed by Bora Dagtekin. With Elyas M'Barek, Katja Riemann, Jella Haase, Sandra Hüller. A bank robber becomes a teacher after being released from prison and finds himself at the center of a number of crazy adventures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6471264/","name":"Fack ju Göhte 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjlkYWJjZDItNzA2OS00ZWZjLTg4NmItNWRjMjJjNTZlODU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ3NzUxOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bank robber becomes a teacher after being released from prison and finds himself at the center of a number of crazy adventures.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6471264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mrpanda-00412"},"dateCreated":"2017-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable, but nowhere as good as the first two movies","reviewBody":"This is the third part of a trilogy and as such the novelty of the scenario is fading. The first movie was surprisingly good and not as expected. The second movie played in an entirely different environment which added a few new elements to the story. Now the third movie's setting is back where it all started: at school.

To me it seemed like the movie does not really know what it wants to do. In the first two movies, the main protagonist (the ex-con teacher) gradually opened up to the children, became friendlier, and started to care for them. This movie reboots the whole thing by making our guy dislike the children at first, only to let him warm up throughout the movie once more. In general the movie seems to re-establish many things for viewers who have not seen the first two movies. The same thing goes for the jokes, which are very similar to the two previous movies, too similar even. Overall I just felt like the two movies never happened and we are seeing more or less the same thing again. Maybe this is why the first half-hour of the movie also seemed a bit like not having a clear purpose at all. The movie wants to establish the situation, but not really. It wants to continue where the predecessors left off, but not really. It throws around jokes that are not new, really.

The second part of the movie gets more interesting and starts following a clearer story-line, albeit in a linear and predictable way. This is not unsurprising for a comedy, but compared to the predecessors it is just not as good.

If you truly enjoyed the first two movies, you will still like this one. If you did not care for the first two movies, this one is definitely not for you. It suffers from exactly the same problems as similar trilogies at the point of the third installment. Take Despicable Me for example. Not a bad movie, just nothing new and no surprises for the viewer.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5479,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-10-26","keywords":"singing in a car,female teacher,teacher student relationship,teacher student conflict,munich germany","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153260825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065929/","name":"Elyas M'Barek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726257/","name":"Katja Riemann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3436464/","name":"Jella Haase"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
Dick und Jane – Zu allem bereit, zu nichts zu gebrauchen
programme.desc: Fun with Dick and Jane: Directed by Dean Parisot. With Jim Carrey, Téa Leoni, Alec Baldwin, Richard Jenkins. When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0369441/","name":"Fun with Dick and Jane","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJiMWFiNzgtMDQxZi00NTFiLWE2YjMtNTA5NzY5YzQxZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0369441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Smells_Like_Cheese"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I had fun with Dick and Jane","reviewBody":"Well, was this the best Jim Carrey comedy? Not really, but it is one of his better late one's. I think because I have had the week from heck, I just needed a good laugh, thanks to Jim. :) Anywho, Dick and Jane are two average Americans who follow by the rules and manage a reasonable budget. When the company that Dick owns goes broke, he is fired, he and Jane are now in trouble when Dick cannot find a job fast enough. Piece by piece they are loosing or having to sell their stuff, when Dick receives an eviction notice, he and Jane have had it and will no longer play by the rules to live their lives once again. With a cast who seemed to enjoy making the film, I think this was over all a funny movie to watch and would recommend it.\n\n7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":141335,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2006-02-08","keywords":"head shop,character names in title,forenames in title,ceo,suburb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fun with Dick and Jane","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3769106713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE1ZDUwODktZmJkZS00Y2Y5LWJkZTItOWE5MGEwMDVmMTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE1ZDUwODktZmJkZS00Y2Y5LWJkZTItOWE5MGEwMDVmMTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000285/","name":"Alec Baldwin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0661751/","name":"Dean Parisot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169347/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0031976/","name":"Judd Apatow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831557/","name":"Nicholas Stoller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301416/","name":"Gerald Gaiser"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Save Yourselves
Save Yourselves!
programme.desc:
Save Yourselves!: Directed by Alex Huston Fischer, Eleanor Wilson. With Sunita Mani, John Reynolds, Ben Sinclair, John Early. A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7873348/","name":"Save Yourselves!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZhYzkwMzQtOWMyZi00NTJmLWFjNGEtYzAzNzJhNDZhMmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDY2MjcyOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7873348/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"End of Days","reviewBody":"How well would a bunch of quinoa-eating, anti-gun liberal progressive Instagramers fare if faced with protecting themselves from an alien invasion?

That's the question this movie asks, and watching the answer play out is humorous, but I couldn't help but think how much better a movie could have been made from such a good premise. For a liberal progressive like myself, it's easy to put myself in the shoes of the protagonists, a hipster couple from New York who decide to take a break from social media at the worst possible time, and there are some chuckles to be had at making fun of them and by extension myself. The film is at its best in the first half, as this oblivious couple gradually catches on that something is amiss. But it unravels the longer it goes on, and the ending falls apart, as if the filmmakers painted themselves into a corner they didn't know how to get out of.

In a year as terrible as 2020, the film's message, which can essentially be boiled down to valuing those closest to you and forget the rest, is welcome. I just wish it had come in a better package.

Grade: B-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6170,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-10-02","keywords":"couple,cabin,cell phone,woods,planet earth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sci-Fi Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi447594777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4576371/","name":"Sunita Mani"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6324745/","name":"John Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4161154/","name":"Ben Sinclair"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0392734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0724160/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092503/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

But it unravels the longer it goes on, and the ending falls apart, as if the filmmakers painted themselves into a corner they didn't know how to get out of.

In a year as terrible as 2020, the film's message, which can essentially be boiled down to valuing those closest to you and forget the rest, is welcome. I just wish it had come in a better package.

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
Dick und Jane – Zu allem bereit, zu nichts zu gebrauchen
programme.desc: Fun with Dick and Jane: Directed by Dean Parisot. With Jim Carrey, Téa Leoni, Alec Baldwin, Richard Jenkins. When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0369441/","name":"Fun with Dick and Jane","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJiMWFiNzgtMDQxZi00NTFiLWE2YjMtNTA5NzY5YzQxZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0369441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Smells_Like_Cheese"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I had fun with Dick and Jane","reviewBody":"Well, was this the best Jim Carrey comedy? Not really, but it is one of his better late one's. I think because I have had the week from heck, I just needed a good laugh, thanks to Jim. :) Anywho, Dick and Jane are two average Americans who follow by the rules and manage a reasonable budget. When the company that Dick owns goes broke, he is fired, he and Jane are now in trouble when Dick cannot find a job fast enough. Piece by piece they are loosing or having to sell their stuff, when Dick receives an eviction notice, he and Jane have had it and will no longer play by the rules to live their lives once again. With a cast who seemed to enjoy making the film, I think this was over all a funny movie to watch and would recommend it.\n\n7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":141335,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2006-02-08","keywords":"head shop,character names in title,forenames in title,ceo,suburb","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fun with Dick and Jane","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3769106713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE1ZDUwODktZmJkZS00Y2Y5LWJkZTItOWE5MGEwMDVmMTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE1ZDUwODktZmJkZS00Y2Y5LWJkZTItOWE5MGEwMDVmMTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000285/","name":"Alec Baldwin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0661751/","name":"Dean Parisot"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169347/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0031976/","name":"Judd Apatow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831557/","name":"Nicholas Stoller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0301416/","name":"Gerald Gaiser"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Save Yourselves
Save Yourselves!
programme.desc:
Save Yourselves!: Directed by Alex Huston Fischer, Eleanor Wilson. With Sunita Mani, John Reynolds, Ben Sinclair, John Early. A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7873348/","name":"Save Yourselves!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZhYzkwMzQtOWMyZi00NTJmLWFjNGEtYzAzNzJhNDZhMmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDY2MjcyOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7873348/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"evanston_dad"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"End of Days","reviewBody":"How well would a bunch of quinoa-eating, anti-gun liberal progressive Instagramers fare if faced with protecting themselves from an alien invasion?

That's the question this movie asks, and watching the answer play out is humorous, but I couldn't help but think how much better a movie could have been made from such a good premise. For a liberal progressive like myself, it's easy to put myself in the shoes of the protagonists, a hipster couple from New York who decide to take a break from social media at the worst possible time, and there are some chuckles to be had at making fun of them and by extension myself. The film is at its best in the first half, as this oblivious couple gradually catches on that something is amiss. But it unravels the longer it goes on, and the ending falls apart, as if the filmmakers painted themselves into a corner they didn't know how to get out of.

In a year as terrible as 2020, the film's message, which can essentially be boiled down to valuing those closest to you and forget the rest, is welcome. I just wish it had come in a better package.

Grade: B-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6170,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-10-02","keywords":"couple,cabin,cell phone,woods,planet earth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sci-Fi Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi447594777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4576371/","name":"Sunita Mani"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6324745/","name":"John Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4161154/","name":"Ben Sinclair"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0392734/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0724160/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092503/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

For a liberal progressive like myself, it's easy to put myself in the shoes of the protagonists, a hipster couple from New York who decide to take a break from social media at the worst possible time, and there are some chuckles to be had at making fun of them and by extension myself. The film is at its best in the first half, as this oblivious couple gradually catches on that something is amiss. But it unravels the longer it goes on, and the ending falls apart, as if the filmmakers painted themselves into a corner they didn't know how to get out of.

In a year as terrible as 2020, the film's message, which can essentially be boiled down to valuing those closest to you and forget the rest, is welcome. I just wish it had come in a better package.

Grade: B-","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6170,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-10-02","keywords":"couple,cabin,cell phone,woods,planet earth","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sci-Fi Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi447594777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4576371/","name":"Sunita Mani","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6324745/","name":"John Reynolds","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4161154/","name":"Ben Sinclair"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0392734/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0724160/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092503/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"],"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119738/","name":"My Best Friend's Wedding","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzRiMGE2MmMtM2RhMy00OWNiLTljYTktOThmMmE1YjY1NjYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119738/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mayfair"},"dateCreated":"2000-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rupert Everett salvages an otherwise dreadful movie","reviewBody":"In his role as Julia Roberts' gay friend George, Rupert Everett effortlessly steals the show--he is urbane and witty, wise and caring, and of course uproariously funny and drop-dead gorgeous. In contrast, "leading man" Dermot Mulroney appears crass, callow, and utterly devoid of charm or magnetism. This movie, billed as a comedy, has an element of mystery at its core: Why on earth would two such winners as Julia Roberts and Cameron Diaz fight for the affections of such a dolt?! programme.title: War on Everyone
Dirty Cops – War on Everyone
programme.desc:
War on Everyone: Directed by John Michael McDonagh. With Alexander Skarsgård, Michael Peña, Theo James, Tessa Thompson. Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3708886/","name":"War on Everyone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU2MjAxMjk3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5NzI5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3708886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zkot-839-452731"},"dateCreated":"2017-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Crazy friggin' movie... I loved it!","reviewBody":"I agree with the review "Unstructured Mess," by Greg from Ontario.

Except I come to a much different conclusion: This is simply cinema showing us the utter meaninglessness of it all -- not necessarily a point I agree or disagree with. So we must endure it all, strange, bizarre, baffling, stupid, ridiculous, and so on, all in the midst of an utter wasteland. As such, we can only live in the present moment, the best we can.

The soundtrack is over the top, with its Latino/Rock/Glen Campbell mix. The music makes the meaninglessness bearable!

So as Greg from Ontario writes, it's pure, unstructured mess. 

In my opinion, that gives you two choices:

Take it or leave it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17927,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"hare krishna,dirty cop,corrupt police,albuquerque new mexico,police detective","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1613936153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNzU2OTQyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE4NDE5MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNzU2OTQyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE4NDE5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two corrupt cops in New Mexico set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path.
